nodes.text: Star Wars Inside Intel: The Creation of the Clone Army

"Star Wars Inside Intel: The Creation of the Clone Army" is an article in the Star Wars Inside Intel series, published on Star Wars.com. Written by Emily Shkoukani, the article details the creation of the clone troopers of the Grand Army of the Republic.
Before you watch the premiere of Star Wars: The Bad Batch, discover the origins of the clone army!
